column1: name: string (the name of the vehicle
column2: usually includes the make and model, e.g., "Toyota Prius")

column1: description: string (a description of the vehicle)
license_plate: string (the vehicle's license plate number)

column2: a unique identifier for the vehicle)

column1: trailer_hook: boolean (whether the vehicle has a trailer hook)
driver_id: string (the current driver of the vehicle
column2: should reference an employee's id from the employee records)

column1: model_id: string (the model of the vehicle
column2: must match the model name defined in Odoo or be included in the CSV file before any vehicle that references it) as defined in https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/17.0/addons/fleet/data/fleet_cars_data.xml

column1: odometer: float (the current odometer reading of the vehicle
odometer_unit: string (the unit of the odometer reading
acquisition_date: date (the date the vehicle was acquired in the format YYYY-MM-DD)
color: string (the color of the vehicle)
location: string (the location where the vehicle is parked or primarily used)
model_year: integer (the year the vehicle was manufactured)
